- You can **only** raid __doors__/__gates__/__hatches__ - **Everything else is un-raid-able**
Requires - `1 Homemade Charge` or `1 Heavy Breaching Charge`
Requires - `2 Homemade Charge` or `1 Heavy Breaching Charge`
**Storage**, **Tents**, and **Underground Base Hatches** require a `hacksaw` to raid.
